extendedInfo.description: The Official App for the Great Taste of the Midwest, one of the premier beer festivals in the United States. On the second Saturday in August, over one hundred brewpubs and microbreweries from the Midwest come to beautiful Olin-Turville Park overlooking lake Monona in Madison, Wisconsin, to share beer and good times with six thousand patrons.Use this handy app to find and rate your favorite beers!Sort and filter by brewery, beer name, beer style, special tapping times, real ales, and more.Keep track of the beers you want to try with the handy to-do list. Show beer locations on the embedded map of the grounds.Continuously updated for the most complete and accurate information on Fest day.-- KNOWN BUGS --* There is a known bug where you might have some to-do beers checked on. What happened is we re-used some ids from last year to this year (yeah, a no-no) and the to-do list is based on beer ids. No good work-around for this year but this won't happen next year. Sorry folks!There are a couple of other minor issues that will be tweaked before Saturday. Keep an eye out for updates.

reviews.title: Well done and easy to use.
reviews.comment: Easy to find, filter, search, and rate beers! Map feature is great to locate the right booth.
reviews.author: Kathryn Svoboda

reviews.comment: This is the best app ever.  Selectors for everything. Going to make the best beer festival ever even more better!
reviews.author: Andy Kailhofer

reviews.title: Great app for the Great Taste
reviews.comment: Thanks for creating this app, and porting it to the Android tablets!
reviews.author: Teresa D.

reviews.title: Loving the new 2013 app
reviews.comment: Works like a champ. I love it when you can look at the map and know what tent your to-do beers are located. The filter is awesome as well.
reviews.author: Brian Watkins

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: Awesome app! Can\'t wait to go! Thank you so much again for the tickets ;-)
reviews.author: Laura Ortiz

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: This only took a year to update...
reviews.author: Jesse Pollock

reviews.title: Get ready for a great Great Taste! (Part 2)
reviews.comment: Add a few more stars to my previous rating.  It turns out that the beer listings ARE in fact fully searchable by style, as well as by tap times and other criteria.  A great app turns out to be even better!  (And this reviewer turns out to be slow on the uptake.)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stopped working saturday morning
reviews.comment: Maybe the server crashed? It worked great at the pre parties, but crashed at open every time since saturday morning. It\'s a shame, as I was really looking forward to using this at the great taste.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Reminder feature
reviews.comment: Very nice app. Love all the ways you can sort the beers. The only thing I would like to see is the ability to add reminders for the special taping times.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update
reviews.comment: Will this app be updated for 2013? Looks awesome!
reviews.author: James McGonigal

reviews.comment: Keep getting \"bad manifest\" error during install.  Not usable for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best thing since the pretzel necklace!
reviews.comment: Must have if you attend the GTMW!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Thanks for this great app - LOVE the map and to-do list features! Cheers!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: well done
reviews.comment: perfect accompaniment to what promises to be a perfect day.  77 and sunny, 500+ beers, app in hand.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Very well done. Will be extremely handy at the fest.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Livery
reviews.comment: I brew the beer for this brewery!  Thanks for featuring our beer in your app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love the app! Looks great! I\'d use it for sure.. but it will not load on my older HTC Hero. Hoping for a new release that I can use.  Thanks!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
